import React, { Component, props, } from 'react' export default class ConfirmDetails extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ paymentType:"", invoiceNo:"", patientName:"", amount:"", payerName:"", nicNo:"", contactNo:"", emailAddress:"", address:"", }; } render() { const {paymentType, invoiceNo, patientName, amount, payerName, nicNo, contactNo, emailAddress, address} = this.state.post return (

Payment Information

Payment Type
{paymentType}
Invoice No
{invoiceNo}
Patient Name
{patientName}
Amount
{amount}

Payer Information

Payer Name
{payerName}
NIC No
{nicNo}
Cotact No
{contactNo}
Email Address
{emailAddress}
Address
{address}

) } }
